Description
Boss labs change the stats of boss
enemies
during rounds. When labs are researched, the base modifiers between enemies will no longer be accurate (ex: boss health will not always be x20 basic if basic health is researched).
Boss Health
Boss Attack
Boss Health Research
Unlocked
lab
in
Milestones
at tier 9 wave 20. Decreases boss health at all waves. Has 30 levels.
Level
Time
Cost
Expand
Value

-0.30%
